title: WTB: Tris Speaker or Christy Matthewson Port
author: Pilot172000

posts.post_title: WTB: Tris Speaker or Christy Matthewson Port
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to make a singular purchase of one of the two cards in varrying condition.  Depending on the price and condition. 

I really want a PSA 2.5 or 3 Tris Speaker or a PSA 1.5 to 2.5 Christy Mathewson portrait.  The 1.5 has to have a lot of eye appeal.  Let me know what's out there.
